verses.roman:
paraṁ brahma dui-nāma samāna ha-ila
punaḥ āra śāstre kichu viśeṣa pāila

synonyms: param brahma—the Absolute Truth; dui-nāma—two names (Rāma and Kṛṣṇa); samāna—on an equal level; ha-ila—were; punaḥ—again; āra—further; śāstre—in revealed scriptures; kichu—some; viśeṣa—specification; pāila—is found.
translation: "As far as the holy names of Rāma and Kṛṣṇa are concerned, they are on an equal level, but for further advancement we receive some specific information from revealed scriptures.
